## WebMessage.postToChildren() method

向子窗口发送消息

**Signature:**

```typescript
postToChildren(message: string, filter: string, source?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | string | 要发送的消息 |
|  filter | string | 消息过滤器 |
|  source | string | _(Optional)_ 目标窗口的源信息，默认为 '\*' |

**Returns:**

void
